```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
data <- read_excel("table.xlsx")
head(data, 10)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(Modern_pop)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(Archaic_pop)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(Modern_pop, fill = Archaic_pop)) +
  geom_bar()
```
